tool_description: Identifies potential conflicts between existing licenses and new licensing requests across territories, time periods, and distribution channels.

content_id.description: Content identifier to check for conflicts

proposed_territories.description: Territories for the proposed new license

proposed_exclusivity.description: Proposed exclusivity level: exclusive, non_exclusive, co_exclusive

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Content not found in rights database.
Invalid date range: proposed_end_date must be after proposed_start_date.
Invalid territory codes: One or more territory codes are not recognized.
Invalid rights specification: Use valid distribution rights types.
Invalid exclusivity type: Use one of [exclusive, non_exclusive, co_exclusive].
Empty proposal: All arrays must contain at least one item.
usage: Provide content_id and complete details of the proposed license including territories, dates, rights, and exclusivity. The tool will identify any conflicts with existing agreements.

conflicting_agreements.description: IDs of existing agreements causing conflicts

available_alternatives.description: Suggested alternative territories or time periods
